title: 2400 North Sheffield Building  |  Buildings  |  Campus Maps  |  DePaul University | DePaul University, Chicago
content: 2400 North Sheffield Building 2400 N. Sheffield Ave.Chicago, IL 60614 Opened in 2009, the 2400 North Sheffield Building is home to many university offices, includingUndergraduate Admissionand the Offices of Graduate Admission for theCollege of Liberal Arts and Social Sciences,theCollege of Science and Health, theCollege of Communicationand theCollege of Education. Admission information sessions also take place in the 2400 North Sheffield Building. ‚Üê Campus Maps
